brief_title: A Randomized Trial of L-735,524, An Inhibitor of the HIV Protease Enzyme, and Interleukin-2 in Persons Infected With HIV (NOTE: Only For Patients Who Previously Completed NIAID 93 CC-113)
brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study L-735,524, which is an inhibitor of the HIV protease enzyme. It will be used with interleukin-2 in patients infected with HIV.
